list_definition.definition: something built of stone, brick, plaster, wood etc and used to separate off or enclose something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There’s a wall at the bottom of the garden

list_definition.definition: any of the sides of a building or room

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: One wall of the room is yellow – the rest are white.

list_definition.definition: (often with in) to enclose (something) with a wall

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We’ve walled in the playground to prevent the children getting out.
